title: Support Ticket Wait Times?
body: Um... come on man. I've been waiting WELL over a week for my support ticket that I had sent issuing a complex technical problem with my patching/updating. When the hell am I gonna get a response? Its felt like its been a {{champion:26}} years, for heaven's sake. Can't I get my issue addressed already!? I'm so eager to get back in the game man. At LEAST an estimated wait time? Whats going on?

replies.body:
I was able to find a ticket under this Summoner Name, but not one that was requested well over a week ago. We've been really slammed with tickets as of late, but our tech team is busting their butts to get through them as quickly as possible. If you remain patient, a tech specialist will get back to you as soon availability allows.

Let me know if you have any questions.
